task_65.description: Place the red tissue between the green cup and the blue cup
task_65.required_objects: red tissue, green paper cup, blue plastic cup
task_65.initial_setup: The green cup is upright on the left side, 20 cm from the edge. The blue cup is upright on the right side, 20 cm from the edge. A yellow plastic cup is tilted and resting on its side near the center.
task_65.final_state: The red tissue is flat and positioned between the green and blue cups, 10 cm from each. The yellow cup is upright on the far left corner.
